title: Philippines Vice President 'Mastermind' Of Plot To Assassinate President: Justice Department
content: The Philippines justice department on Monday labelled Vice President Sara Duterte the "mastermind" of a plot to assassinate the country's president, giving her five days to respond to a subpoena.
summary: The Philippines justice department on Monday labelled Vice President Sara Duterte the "mastermind" of a plot to assassinate the country's president, giving her five days to respond to a subpoena.

title: French Rape Trial Must 'Change Relations Between Men, Women': Prosecutor
content: The trial in France of a man charged with enlisting dozens of strangers to rape his heavily-sedated wife has shaken French society and must fundamentally change relationships between men and women, a prosecutor said Monday.
summary: The trial in France of a man charged with enlisting dozens of strangers to rape his heavily-sedated wife has shaken French society and must fundamentally change relationships between men and women, a prosecutor said Monday.

title: Audi Drops Iconic Four Rings Logo In China, Internet Says "Bad Move"
content: The new AUDI logo is part of a project with Chinese automaker SAIC to co-develop electric vehicles aimed at attracting younger customers in the world's largest auto market.
summary: The new AUDI logo is part of a project with Chinese automaker SAIC to co-develop electric vehicles aimed at attracting younger customers in the world's largest auto market.

title: Video Captures Moment When Cargo Plane Crashed In Lithuania
content: At least one person died and three others were injured after a cargo plane crashed at Lithuania's Vilnius airport early on Monday. The Boeing 737-400, operated for DHL by the Spanish cargo airline Swiftair, was flying from Germany to Lithuania.
summary: At least one person died and three others were injured after a cargo plane crashed at Lithuania's Vilnius airport early on Monday. The Boeing 737-400, operated for DHL by the Spanish cargo airline Swiftair, was flying from Germany to Lithuania.

title: South Korean Man Caught Overeating To Avoid Military Service, Lands In Jail
content: The 26-year-old was sentenced to a year in prison, suspended for two years, under the Military Service Act.
summary: The 26-year-old was sentenced to a year in prison, suspended for two years, under the Military Service Act.

title: The Age Of MBS Has Begun: Saudi Prince's Influence On Economy Beyond Oil
content: Mohammed bin Salman's rise to power had been marked by extravagant spending, bold cultural reforms and a devastating war in Yemen.

title: UK's King Charles Plans Visit To India Amid Health Concerns: Reports
content: Britain's King Charles III is reportedly planning an official visit to India early next year. Queen Camilla will accompany the King on the royal tour to the Indian subcontinent, which is part of a government-led charm offensive.
summary: Britain's King Charles III is reportedly planning an official visit to India early next year. Queen Camilla will accompany the King on the royal tour to the Indian subcontinent, which is part of a government-led charm offensive.

title: 45 Years Later, California Murder Mystery Solved Through DNA Evidence
content: 17-year-old Esther Gonzalez's body was found in a snowpack near a highway in Riverside County, California, on February 10, 1979.

title: Earth's Rotation Has Tilted 31.5 Inches And Humans Are To Blame
content: Earth's tilt, or axial precession, is influenced by the distribution of mass (in this case water) across the planet.
summary: Earth's tilt, or axial precession, is influenced by the distribution of mass (in this case water) across the planet.

title: 1 Killed, House Catches Fire As Cargo Plane Crashes In Lithuania
content: A DHL cargo plane flying from Germany to Lithuania crashed early Monday near the airport of the capital Vilnius killing one person.
summary: A DHL cargo plane flying from Germany to Lithuania crashed early Monday near the airport of the capital Vilnius killing one person.

title: Will Parent-Killing Menendez Brothers Be Freed? Court Hearing From Today
content: Lyle and Erik Menendez are set to face a judge Monday as the campaign to free them from their life sentences for the shotgun murders of their parents gathers pace.
summary: Lyle and Erik Menendez are set to face a judge Monday as the campaign to free them from their life sentences for the shotgun murders of their parents gathers pace.

title: In Bangladesh Camps, Rohingya Refugees Mobilise To Fight In Myanmar
content: One day in July, Rafiq slipped out of the world's largest refugee settlement in southern Bangladesh and crossed the border into Myanmar on a small boat. His destination: a ruinous civil war in a nation that he had fled in 2017.
summary: One day in July, Rafiq slipped out of the world's largest refugee settlement in southern Bangladesh and crossed the border into Myanmar on a small boat. His destination: a ruinous civil war in a nation that he had fled in 2017.

title: Scott Bessent, Trump's US Treasury Pick, Fuels Global Relief Rally Vs Dollar
content: The selection of Scott Bessent as the next Treasury Secretary has fueled a rally in currencies around the world against the dollar, as traders trim bets that the return of Donald Trump will send tremors throughout global markets.
summary: The selection of Scott Bessent as the next Treasury Secretary has fueled a rally in currencies around the world against the dollar, as traders trim bets that the return of Donald Trump will send tremors throughout global markets.

title: Uruguay's Left Returns To Presidency As Yamandu Orsi Wins Election
content: Center-leftopposition candidate Yamandu Orsi secured victory inUruguay'spresidential election, official results showed on Sunday, with 99 per cent of votes tallied, in a second-round race that pollsters expected to be closely fought.
summary: Center-leftopposition candidate Yamandu Orsi secured victory inUruguay'spresidential election, official results showed on Sunday, with 99 per cent of votes tallied, in a second-round race that pollsters expected to be closely fought.

title: Far-Right Pro-Russian Populist Takes Surprise Lead In Romania Elections
content: Far-right candidate Calin Georgescu surged unexpectedly in Romania's presidential election, pulling ahead of the pro-European prime minister with more than 98 percent of votes counted Monday and looking all but certain to advance to a runoff.
summary: Far-right candidate Calin Georgescu surged unexpectedly in Romania's presidential election, pulling ahead of the pro-European prime minister with more than 98 percent of votes counted Monday and looking all but certain to advance to a runoff.

title: Rare Edition Of Machiavelli's 'The Prince' To Fetch Rs 3.18 Crore At Auction
content: A rare first edition of Italian Renaissance diplomat Niccolo Machiavelli's political treatise, The Prince,' is set to go under the hammer at an estimated value of up to £300,000 (around Rs 3.18 crore).
